short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to automatically hide WoWHead news articles based on keywords & phrases.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a simple browser extension that automatically hides WoWHead news articles based on the keywords or phrases that you specify and what the "Headline" is.

No more do you have to sort through unending waves of garbage when they copy/paste the same article 17 times about some vague cosmetic from vanilla being off 1 pixel on a new race! Filter straight to gameplay articles & Live/PTR patch notes!

This extension will sync your keywords across all your devices, so you only have to set them up once.
